text: israyel makkalilekku dutanayi niyeagikkum. ‎avan parayum: "nan ninnalute nathanil ninnulla ‎telivumayan ninnalute atuttu vannirikkunnat. ‎nan ninnalkkayi kalimannukeant paksiyute ‎rupamuntakkum. pinne nanatilutiyal ‎allahuvinre anumatiyeate atearu ‎paksiyayittirum. janmana kannillattavaneyum ‎pandureagiyeyum nan sukhappetuttum. ‎daivahitamanusaricc mariccavare jivippikkum. ninnal ‎tinnunnatentennum vitukalil suksiccuveccat ‎eteakkeyennum nan ninnalkku vivariccu tarum. ‎tirccayayum atilellam ninnalkk ‎atayalannalunt; ninnal visvasikalenkil! ‎
